statements: SELECT id, reported_symptoms, nutrient_deficiency FROM NutrientDeficiencies;
SELECT reported_symptoms, nutrient_deficiency, id FROM NutrientDeficiencies;
SELECT nutrient_deficiency, reported_symptoms, id FROM NutrientDeficiencies;
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE id > 3;
SELECT reported_symptoms FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE nutrient_deficiency = 'Iron';
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT reported_symptoms, nutrient_deficiency FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY nutrient_deficiency ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT nutrient_deficiency FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE reported_symptoms LIKE '%fatigue%';
SELECT id, reported_symptoms FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE nutrient_deficiency IN ('Iron', 'Vitamin D', 'Zinc');
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE reported_symptoms LIKE '%hair loss%' ORDER BY reported_symptoms DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT symptom, nutrient FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE symptom = 'Yellowing leaves';
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE nutrient = 'Iron' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT symptom, COUNT(*) as total_reports FROM ReportedSymptoms GROUP BY symptom ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, reported_date FROM ReportedSymptoms WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reported_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT symptom FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE nutrient = 'Iron' ORDER BY symptom ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, symptom, reported_date FROM ReportedSymptoms WHERE reported_date >= '2022-08-15';
SELECT nutrient, COUNT(*) FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms GROUP BY nutrient HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencySymptoms WHERE symptom LIKE '%deficiency%' OR symptom LIKE '%symptom%';
SELECT * FROM Symptoms;
SELECT symptom_name, reported_date FROM Symptoms WHERE symptom_id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_name, daily_requirement FROM Nutrients ORDER BY nutrient_id DESC;

SELECT symptom_name, nutrient_name, severity_level FROM Symptoms JOIN Deficiency ON Symptoms.symptom_id = Deficiency.symptom_id JOIN Nutrients ON Deficiency.nutrient_id = Nutrients.nutrient_id WHERE severity_level = 'Severe';
SELECT symptom_name, COUNT(*) AS total_deficiencies FROM Symptoms JOIN Deficiency ON Symptoms.symptom_id = Deficiency.symptom_id GROUP BY symptom_name ORDER BY total_deficiencies DESC;
SELECT * FROM Symptoms;
SELECT nutrient_name, daily_requirement FROM Nutrients WHERE daily_requirement > 50;
SELECT symptom_name, reported_date FROM Symptoms WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Deficiency WHERE severity_level = 'Severe';
SELECT symptom_name, nutrient_name FROM Symptoms JOIN Deficiency ON Symptoms.symptom_id = Deficiency.symptom_id JOIN Nutrients ON Deficiency.nutrient_id = Nutrients.nutrient_id;
SELECT * FROM NutrientDeficiencies;
SELECT deficiency_id, symptom FROM NutrientDeficiencies WHERE deficiency_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT nutrient_name, daily_requirement FROM Nutrients WHERE daily_requirement > 10;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, NutrientDeficiencies.symptom, Reports.report_date FROM Patients, NutrientDeficiencies, Reports WHERE Patients.patient_id = Reports.patient_id AND NutrientDeficiencies.deficiency_id = Reports.deficiency_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, deficiency_id, report_date FROM Patients JOIN Reports ON Patients.patient_id = Reports.patient_id;
SELECT nutrient_name, daily_requirement FROM Nutrients WHERE daily_requirement > 50;

SELECT patient_name, symptom, nutrient_name FROM Patients JOIN Reports ON Patients.patient_id = Reports.patient_id JOIN NutrientDeficiencies ON Reports.deficiency_id = NutrientDeficiencies.deficiency_id;
SELECT * FROM Symptoms;
SELECT symptom_name, description FROM Symptoms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_name, level FROM NutrientLevels ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Deficiencies WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT symptom_name, description FROM Symptoms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_name, level FROM NutrientLevels WHERE level > 5;
SELECT * FROM Deficiencies WHERE severity = 'Severe';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, symptom_id, reported_date FROM UserSymptoms ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
